title: Gimmicks are dead — just make a good phone
description: Buyers aren't interested in all the fancy tricks OEMs come up with. They just want a phone that excels at the basics.

title: I installed Windows on my iPad so you don’t have to
description: Its an exercise in frustration and requires a lot of patience. But the bigger question remains: Is it worth it?

title: Bose and Razer smart glasses are silly, but I still believe they have potential
description: I'm not impressed with pairs like the Bose Frames Tempo or Razer Anzu. Here's what they could do better.
